statements: UPDATE analytics_data SET event_value = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_date = '2022-10-31' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_name = 'Clicked' WHERE event_value > 50;
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_name='login' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_data SET user_email='example@example.com' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_data SET user_name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE pageviews SET page_url = '/new-page' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE events SET event_name = 'Updated Event' WHERE event_id = 3;
UPDATE analytics.users SET email = 'example1@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE analytics.products SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE analytics.orders SET quantity = 5 WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE Sales SET amount = amount + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Sales SET sales_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Sales SET product_id = 3, amount = 20 WHERE id = 3;
